tail.name: tail
tail.transformationDescription:
#IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) A chitinous, dragonfly-like abdomen sprouts from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.She] then [npc.verb(realise)] that the transformation isn't done, as after a tingling sensation has run up from the tip of [npc.her] new abdomen, [npc.she] instinctively [npc.verb(know)] that [npc.she] now [npc.has] a set of hooks at the end.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldDarkTeal(dragonfly-like abdomen)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ELSE Chitinous, dragonfly-like abdomens sprout from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until they're about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.She] then [npc.verb(realise)] that the transformation isn't done, as after tingling sensations have run up from the tip of [npc.her] new abdomens, [npc.she] instinctively [npc.verb(know)] that [npc.she] now [npc.has] multiple sets of hooks at the end of [npc.her] tails.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] [style.boldDarkTeal(dragonfly-like abdomens)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ENDIF
tail.bodyDescription: Growing out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] #IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) a #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] dragonfly abdomen, which is narrow and far longer than [npc.her] torso. #ELSE [npc.tailCount] #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] dragonfly abdomens, which are a very long and narrow. #ENDIF
